amendment.description: Amendment removes provisions related to brochure delivery and the requirement for annual audits at select private funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in Part B of House Report 114-725 to remove provisions related to brochure delivery and the requirement for annual audits at select private funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Foster.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
